name: PlayHT
headline: Our mission is to make Voice AI accessible and useful to all.
description: Play is a Voice AI company that specializes in building conversational voice models capable of cloning any voice or accent and generating speech in real-time.

founders.name: Hammad Syed, Founder
founders.description:
Building the future of voice technology at Play.ht. I'm super passionate about building and scaling products that add value and make a difference in people's lives.

I've been a software engineer and a product person in my past role at OLX where I met Mahmoud to start Play.ht. My experience ranges from bootstrapping products to profitability, SEO, product management, and building and deploying end-to-end systems that deliver high-impact business value within constrained timelines.

## Ethical AI & Safety
We are dedicated to ensuring our Voice AI is used responsibly and safely.
## Learn About our AI Voice Generation & Text-to-Speech Technology
### What is AI Voice?
AI Voice is a computer generated voice powered by machine learning and can generate speech from text with natural intonation and real accents. AI Voices are created by machine learning models that process hundreds of hours of voice recordings from real voiceover artists and then learn to speak based on the audio recordings. Today AI Voices are used in several applications due to their natural-sounding tone.
### What is an AI voice generator?
An AI voice generator, often referred to as a Text to Speech (TTS) system, is a technology that utilizes artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms to convert written text into spoken words. This advanced technology mimics human speech patterns, intonation, and natural language, producing lifelike and human-like voices.
### How long does it take to synthesize text into speech?
The [text to speech](https://play.ht/</text-to-speech/>) synthesis is real time in most cases, and only takes a couple of minutes to convert the input text into audio. Our TTS software runs in the cloud, so if you are converting large amounts of text then you can paste it in our voice generator\'s interface and start the conversion. There\'s no need for you to wait for the conversion to finish. Once the audio is ready, the files will be available in your dashboard to download.
### What customizations can I do with the AI Voices?
All our [AI Voices](https://play.ht/</text-to-speech/>) support [SSML](https://play.ht/<https:/play.ht/blog/what-is-ssml/>) features - rate, pitch, volume and pronunciations. You can add custom pauses for different punctuation marks to create a more natural speaking tone. Adjust the pitch of the voice to make it sound more deeper or child-like. The speaking rate allows you to increase or decrease the speed of voice. With our pronunciations library you can save custom pronunciations and use them whenever you create speech.
### Can I use the voices for commercial purpose?
Yes, all our voices can be used for commercial purposes. Please refer to our [pricing](https://play.ht/</pricing/>) page to select the appropriate plan that offers commercial rights.
### Do you offer a free version?
Yes, we do offer a free version that allows you to preview all the available voices and convert a few words to audio.
### How real does an AI generated voice sound?
Extremely real. Our voice models are built to generate speech exactly like a human, including natural pausing, breathing, and using filler words to mimic a real human being. Give our latest voice model, PlayHT3.0 a try and listen to the generated voice yourself!
### How much does an AI voice cost?
There are two types of costs involved with AI Voices - cost of cloning or creating the voices, and the cost of generating speech using the voices. Both require GPUs. Generally, the cost for cloning varies from a few tens to hundred dollars per voice, where as the cost for generating speech depends on the volume of text you are looking to convert to audio. Please check our [pricing](https://play.ht/</pricing/>) or [contact us](https://play.ht/</contact-us/>) for a quote. 
### How to generate an AI voice?
Generating an AI Voice is straightforward. The first thing you need to do is either create a voice, or select from a library of pre-built voices. PlayHT offers both - instant voice cloning and hundreds of ready to use voices. The next thing is to simply convert the text in to audio using the synthetic AI Voice. You can either use PlayHT's online Studio which offers a simple yet powerful Text to Voice functionality or use our API. Sign up to get started for free!
### Can I generate character AI voices using PlayHT?
Yes, absolutely. One of PlayHT's use cases is to help users build conversational AI characters. Do check our Character Voice Generator page for more information, and try our real-time streaming [TTS API](https://play.ht/</text-to-speech-api/>) to give your characters a voice.
### How does PlayHT generate realistic AI voices?
Data plays a key role when building AI Voice models. The audio needs to be clear and high-quality for the best results. PlayHT's voice models were carefully built using the best available open datasets along with state-of-the-art model architecture that generates the most realistic AI Voices.
### Does PlayHT work offline?
PlayHT works online but we do offer on-premise deployments of our Voice models. Please [reach out to us](https://play.ht/</contact-us/>) if you're interested. We are working on making the models smaller and faster so they can eventually run offline on devices.
### Is there a free AI tool that can convert text to speech?
Yes, PlayHT offers a free version of our AI voice generator that converts text to life like speech. you can create an account and use PlayHT for free. The free account gives you a few thousand character credits to convert to speech along with Instant Voice Cloning feature.
### Which is the best AI voice generator?
PlayHT stands out as the best AI voice generator. Our platform boasts over 800 natural-sounding AI voices across 142 languages, ensuring unparalleled quality and versatility. We have the best AI voice that truly resembles a human voice, and people can't identify that the voice was AI-generated.
### How do you get AI voice over?
Generating an AI Voice is straightforward. The first thing you need to do is either create a voice, or select from a library of pre-built voices. PlayHT offers both - instant voice cloning and hundreds of ready to use voices. The next thing is to simply convert the text in to audio using the synthetic AI Voice. You can either use PlayHT's online Studio which offers a simple yet powerful Text to Voice functionality or use our API. Sign up to get started for free!
### Is the use of AI voices legal?
Absolutely! AI voices generated through PlayHT are legal and come with full commercial rights. We prioritize ethical AI practices and ensure our users can use our voices responsibly.
### What is the AI tool that reads text aloud?
PlayHT is an AI tool that reads text aloud with unmatched realism. Our advanced AI technology ensures the voice output is natural, expressive, and indistinguishable from human speech.
### What is the most realistic AI voice that sounds human?
PlayHT offers the most realistic AI voices in the industry. Our state-of-the-art technology captures nuances, emotions, and intonations, delivering a human-like voice experience for any content. Our latest voice model blurs the line between real and synthetic voice, which is why our users voted PlayHT as one of the leading best AI Voice Generators.
### What is the AI voice generator everyone is using on Tiktok?
Various AI voice generator tools have become popular on platforms like TikTok, among which PlayHT is notably prominent. Other popular brands in this realm comprise Speechify, Veed.io, Synthesia.io, and Google Text-to-Speech, among others. These tools utilize sophisticated text-to-speech technology to create customizable and natural-sounding voices.
### What AI are people using for celebrity voices?
Various AI voice generators offer the capability to [replicate celebrity voices](https://play.ht/</use-cases/celebrity-voice-generator/>). Notably, PlayHT is recognized for its unique features in this domain, and it stands out for its ability to mimic celebrity voices.However, users should be aware that the legal and ethical use of AI-generated voices, particularly those resembling celebrities, may be subject to local copyright and privacy laws, and securing permissions and licenses is crucial before utilizing these voices for public or commercial purposes.
### How do you make an AI voice sound like someone?
To create an AI voice resembling someone, use PlayHT's AI voice cloning technology, which follows a precise process. It starts with collecting a substantial amount of audio recordings of the target individual. Next, these recordings are then used to train and fine-tune our AI voice synthesis model. Once the model is ready, it can generate voice recordings that mimic the target person's voice.

## Learn About our AI Voice Generation & Text-to-Speech Technology
### What is AI Voice?
AI Voice is a computer generated voice powered by machine learning and can generate speech from text with natural intonation and real accents. AI Voices are created by machine learning models that process hundreds of hours of voice recordings from real voiceover artists and then learn to speak based on the audio recordings. Today AI Voices are used in several applications due to their natural-sounding tone.
### What is an AI voice generator?
An AI voice generator, often referred to as a Text to Speech (TTS) system, is a technology that utilizes artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms to convert written text into spoken words. This advanced technology mimics human speech patterns, intonation, and natural language, producing lifelike and human-like voices.
### How long does it take to synthesize text into speech?
The text to speech⟨16⟩ synthesis is real time in most cases, and only takes a couple of minutes to convert the input text into audio. Our TTS software runs in the cloud, so if you are converting large amounts of text then you can paste it in our voice generator\'s interface and start the conversion. There\'s no need for you to wait for the conversion to finish. Once the audio is ready, the files will be available in your dashboard to download.
### What customizations can I do with the AI Voices?
All our AI Voices⟨16⟩ support SSML⟨64⟩ features - rate, pitch, volume and pronunciations. You can add custom pauses for different punctuation marks to create a more natural speaking tone. Adjust the pitch of the voice to make it sound more deeper or child-like. The speaking rate allows you to increase or decrease the speed of voice. With our pronunciations library you can save custom pronunciations and use them whenever you create speech.
### Can I use the voices for commercial purpose?
Yes, all our voices can be used for commercial purposes. Please refer to our pricing⟨65⟩ page to select the appropriate plan that offers commercial rights.
### Do you offer a free version?
Yes, we do offer a free version that allows you to preview all the available voices and convert a few words to audio.
### How real does an AI generated voice sound?
Extremely real. Our voice models are built to generate speech exactly like a human, including natural pausing, breathing, and using filler words to mimic a real human being. Give our latest voice model, PlayHT3.0 a try and listen to the generated voice yourself!
### How much does an AI voice cost?
There are two types of costs involved with AI Voices - cost of cloning or creating the voices, and the cost of generating speech using the voices. Both require GPUs. Generally, the cost for cloning varies from a few tens to hundred dollars per voice, where as the cost for generating speech depends on the volume of text you are looking to convert to audio. Please check our pricing⟨65⟩ or contact us⟨8⟩ for a quote.

generated_description:
**PlayHT: The Voice AI Innovator**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from the heart of Silicon Valley, PlayHT is carving out its niche in the Voice AI arena. Their mission? To make Voice AI accessible and useful for everyone. This isn’t just about creating digital voices; it’s about forging connections, enhancing experiences, and empowering creators.

### What They Do
PlayHT specializes in advanced voice models that can clone any voice or accent, generating highly realistic speech in real-time. The company's standout product, PlayDialog, is currently in beta, focusing on delivering fluid and emotive conversation. With over 800 natural-sounding voices available across 142 languages, PlayHT is redefining what’s possible in text-to-speech technology.

### Their Offerings
PlayHT's products cater to a variety of uses, from AI voiceovers for videos and podcasts to voice generation APIs for developers. The platform can enhance audio publishing and storytelling, making it invaluable for creators from all walks of life. Their technology is trusted by brands like DoorDash, Moderna, and Salesforce, proving its reliability and effectiveness.

### Team & Culture
Located in Mountain View with a growing team of around 35 employees, PlayHT is backed by Y Combinator, specifically part of the Batch W23. Under the guidance of Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer, the company embodies the iterative, innovative spirit of the accelerator.

### Key Features
- **AI Voice Cloning:** Perfectly replicates voices, and accents, enhancing creative projects and marketing efforts.
- **Real-Time Speech Generation:** Converts text to voice in real time, making it a seamless tool for content creators.
- **Customizable Voice Options:** Users can adjust pitch, rate, and emotion to produce customized audio outputs that engage listeners effectively.

### Ethical Commitment
PlayHT emphasizes ethical AI use, ensuring that their technology is applied responsibly. They acknowledge concerns around voice cloning and the importance of ethical practices in AI deployment.

### The Future
With their innovative platform and a mission to democratize voice AI, PlayHT is set to disrupt the voice technology landscape. Whether one needs a voice for e-learning, IVR systems, or even dubbing and translation, PlayHT has tailored solutions ready for a wide array of applications.

Let’s be clear: in a world where digital interactions are increasing, PlayHT is at the forefront, crafting voices that resonate with humanity. If you’re intrigued, you can explore more on their [website](https://play.ht/) and take their technologies for a spin.
